channel.title: Simple crown help
channel.description:
okay first yes i know there are loads of guides on this, but its only one little thing that i need done
All i need to know how to do is make PlayerRights 4 (Hidden Admin) have a crown. i need to do this so that i can change PlayerRights 1 to donator, 2 to mod, 3 to admin and 4 to owner.
Please help, i would much appreciate it :)

item.title: Simple crown help
item.dc:creator: @hippo429 hippo429
item.description:
@hippo429 wrote:

just simplify the whole thing… check for a donator tutorial and it will tell you how to create a playerdonator in the character file… its so simple

Read full topic

item.title: Simple crown help
item.dc:creator: @bo_3wais bo 3wais
item.description:
@bo_3wais wrote:

tbh thats simple, the rights doesnt affect “mod” “donator” “admin” “owner” its just a source, it just tells commands, applications, shops wut rights u r, to change wut each is u have to change almost the whole source, just go around and see wut needs changing in each file, like… if u want donators (rights = 1) do something other players cant… example a command, u go to command.java then go to the command u want to be donator only add:

if (p.rights >= 1) {

so if the command is “::teleto” it would look like this :

if (p.rights = 1) {
if (cmd[0].equals(“teleto”)) {
Player other = Server.engine.players[Engine.getIdFromName(playerCommand.substring((playerCommand.indexOf(" “) + 1)))];
if (other.wildernessZone(other.absX, other.absY) && !p.wildWarned) {
p.message(other.username+” is in the wilderness, if you truely wish to teleport to “+other.username+”, type this command again.");
p.wildWarned = true;
}
if (other != null) {
p.setCoords(other.absX, other.absY, other.heightLevel);
p.wildWarned = false;
}
}

as u see, the source isnt set to wut the “1 = donator, 2 = mod, 3 = admin , and 4 = owner” its set to ur preferences, example: u want a donator to be the “p.rights = 1” just go to their file and make it 1. but if u want it be donator qualities, u have to change the source

so technacily, ull have to find the place were the crowns r stored, and edit which goes with each p.rights, from wut i remember its in a file like player.java or testworldloader.java or somethin like that

Read full topic
